title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Learn About the Park                 Looking to learn more? News Browse press releases, and dig into archieved news. Photos and more Experience the park from afar! Check out our photo galleries and multimedia galleries. History Discover the recent and ancient history of Cedar Breaks. Nature Learn more about the plants and animals that call Cedar Breaks home. Education Cedar Breaks is a wonderful outdoor classroom for school groups. For more information on planning a field trip, or to see if your group qualifies for a fee waiver exemption click on the link above.
